    static Transform3 Transform3.identity​(Transform3 target)
    Sets a transform to the identity.
    Transform3 Transform3.lookAt​(Vec3 point, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look at a target point.

    The transform eases toward the look at rotation because discontinuities arise with using a look at matrix when a transform's look direction is parallel with the world up axis.
    Transform3 Transform3.lookIn​(Vec3 dir, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look toward a direction.

    The transform eases toward the look at rotation because discontinuities arise with using a look at matrix when a transform's look direction is parallel with the world up axis.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveBy​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction to a new location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveByGlobal​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction to a new location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveByLocal​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction multiplied by the transform's rotation.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew)
    Sets the transforms' location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew, float step)
    Eases the transform to a location by a step.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew, float step, Vec3.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Eases the transform to a location by a step.
    static Transform3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the face's normal.

    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the vertex's normal.

    Transform3 Transform3.revert()
    Reverts this transform to its previous state, i.e., swaps current location, rotation and scale with the previous.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateBy​(float angle, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates the transform by adding a rotation.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew)
    Rotates the transform to a new orientation, then updates the transform's axes.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew, float step)
    Eases the transform toward a new orientation by a step in [0.0, 1.0] .

    Transform3 Transform3.wrap​(Vec3 lb, Vec3 ub)
    Wraps the transform's location around a periodic range as defined by an upper and lower bound: lower bounds inclusive; upper bounds exclusive.

    Curve3 Curve3.reframe​(Transform3 tr)
    Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .

    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .

    Curve3 Curve3.toOrigin​(Transform3 tr)
    Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.toOrigin​(Transform3 tr)
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point.
    Curve3 Curve3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the curve permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a curve entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple curve entities into one curve entity.
    Edge3 Edge3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms this edge by a transform.
    Face3 Face3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the face by a transform.
    Knot3 Knot3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Multiplies this knot by a transform.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the mesh permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a mesh entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple mesh entities into one mesh entity.
